replies.body: where r the {{champion:56}} skins
Shrouded in darkness.
WHAT?
{{summoner:14}} {{champion:63}}
Still waiting on PROJECT: Lucian that was meant to be in the "early" sales {{item:3070}}
It means early from the time that they were released, not early in the month. They happen around 25-26th of each month.

This definition is correct, although they can happen earlier in the month. See the early sale announcement article for reference.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts
;( I also wanted Project Lucian, my last one to complete the project series ;(
Then keep an eye out, his sale may hit the store soon.
How come singed skins are never on sale? {{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}  you see all these people demanding Yasuo skins, but all these other popular skins are being ignored #BanYasuo
Appears there were two Singed skins on sale in December and another in January. Don't lose hope though, now that four skins go on sale per rotation he's more likely to come around again in future.

I ban Yasuo in ranked, not because he's any good (he is actually quite overated, he literally is shit in the first 10 mins), but when there is one on my team, they will always feed, WHY DO THEY DO THIS TO ME!
I WANT BLOODMOON YASUO{{champion:157}}

As Blood Moon Yasuo is a new skin it won't appear in an early sale for roughly 6 months. See the early sale announcement article for more info: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

Hey Rito, any fixes on the computer freeze issues after patch 6.5? I wanna fix this before the grudge match sales end. I have tried uninstalling LOL and i dont run nvidea. If you cant tell  me a answer, maybe link me to a forum topic about how to fix this? Thanks Rito!{{item:3070}} 


P.s im running windows 8
Please [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for help with tech issues.
Never mind just spent my entire day updateing to win 10 so i can play LOL. My devotion to lol is stronger than my hate of win 10 :P
windows 10 ftw man

OMFG,just got Astro Nautilus last week, refund Riot！

Sorry, dude. Our sale price difference grace period is 2 weeks prior to the sale, and all of these sales are now announced at least two weeks prior to the month they're in. So it only really applies to surprise sales or late announcements.
Additionally, it may not be until the end of April that AstroNautilus goes on sale.
